name: Potion Seller (Unfinished)
description:
Play as a local alchemist and make potions for the denizens of the town.

People will come from far and wide for your finest potions.

Join together ingredients from your rack of supplies to make potions for your clients.

Check your potion book for ingredient requirements and get brewing!

How to Play:

After a customer comes in and tells you what kind of potion they want, reference your potion manual to discern ingredients for the potion you want to make. Grab an ingredient from the ingredient rack and bring it over to the cauldron to add it in. Use three ingredients to make your potion, mix it up, and bring it to the customer.
